caption: The image is a cartoon drawing of a landscape featuring a lake, trees, and a hill. The scene is set on Earth Day, April 22, 2021. The text in the image reads "Earth Day," and there is a quote below it that says, "Save the environment, and you will save the life and future." The image conveys a message about the importance of preserving the environment for future generations.
texts:
"Save The Environment,
And You Will Save The Life And Future".

And You Will Save The Life And Future".
